abstract: Lookout, which makes mobile phone security apps, plans to introduce one for the iPhone, even though it has so far been less vulnerable to attacks.
snippet: Lookout, which makes mobile phone security apps, plans to introduce one for the iPhone, even though it has so far been less vulnerable to attacks.
lead_paragraph: Most iPhone users blithely believe that their phones are safe from hackers. Unlike Android phones, which have been the target of a few malicious attacks, iPhones have so far been less vulnerable because Android is growing faster and because, unlike Apple, it does not screens all apps before allowing them in its app store.

headline.main: Lookout Introduces a Security App for iPhones
